QuestData.Title: A Change of Scenery
QuestData.Description: Excellent. There's an exit in the eastern end of the mine that leads to Brunnhildar Village. Follow it and I'll meet you there.$B$BWe must not be seen together so no one suspects you of aiding me. I'll use my magic to disguise my appearance. Do not worry, $r -- we'll find your friend in no time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Reconvene with Lok'lira the Crone in Brunnhildar Village.
QuestData.RewardText: You're here -- good. I think I know where your goblin is.
